data.title: The Unsewing Machine (1986)
data.meta_description: The insane Doctor Enger is obsessed with his plan to build a hospital to cure blind children, and goes on a killing and kidnapping spree with the police in pursuit.

Delirious kidnap & crime spree dark comedy/thriller from triple threat Jean-Pierre Mocky. This is my third Mocky film and I'm still not sure what this guy is all about. All I know is that he is super prolific and loves to cast himself in major roles.

La machine a decoudre is the age old story of an unemployed cabinet maker(Peter Semler) who goes into town to sell his prized gun in order to help support his expecting wife, on his way he saves a rando(Mocky) from getting hit by a bus and this rando is so appreciative that he kidnaps the cabinetmaker and leads him on an all day crime spree which is somehow related to his desire to build aâ€¦
